attributes.action: Stop the Corruption of Medical practice by the Drug Industry and other profit making organisations involved with medicine.
attributes.additional_details:
Most of the drug industry has no real interest in curing or preventing disease because if it did it would put itself
out of business.
 It's only real interest is making money from patent drugs which only treat symptoms of disease whilst
ignoring root cause factors.In fact one of the main
root cause factors of disease are the known and
probable unknown harmful side effects of the drugs
themselves!

 Often symptoms of disease are suppressed for a period maybe many years but at the cost of the
patient's health.
 In the meantime the root cause factors are also
still at work.
 And what if the diagnosis of the disease is wrong??
 No research can establish the safety of any product because it is not possible to prove that it is NOT causing SUB-CLINICAL disease.
  The testing of drugs is usually done over a period
of a few years though the CLINICAL symptoms
from the side effects may take 10 or 20 or more years to become apparent.
So this corruption must be addressed.
